      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Touple[] Model.getLegalMoves​(Touple t)

      Gives the location of a piece on the board as known by the board, given any piece that is on the board.
      Touple Board.randomEmptySpace()
      Gets a random space that has nothing in it.

      Determines whether a given space is black or white, given where it is.

      Determines if a given Touple is a valid space within the board.

      void Model.removePiece​(Touple oldSpace)

      Checks whether a space is occupied by any piece, regardless of color
      boolean Model.spaceEmpty​(Touple t)  

    • Uses of Touple in movement

      Subclasses of Touple in movement 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Move
      A move is a set of relative coordinates, to which a piece may move.
      Methods in movement that return Touple 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Touple Touple.add​(int dx, int dy)
      Make a new touple based on this touple plus a change.
      static Touple Touple.add​(Touple a, Touple b)
      Static addition functionality, to find a new Touple that sums the values of each.
      Touple MoveHistory.getNegative()
      Gets the Touple it would take to move form the new to the old position, relatively.
      Touple MoveHistory.getNewPosition()
      Accessor for the new position.
      Touple MoveHistory.getOldPosition()
      Accessor for the old position.
      Touple MoveHistory.getPositive()
      Gets the Touple it would take to move from the old to the new position, relatively.
      Methods in movement with parameters of type Touple 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Touple Touple.add​(Touple a, Touple b)
      Static addition functionality, to find a new Touple that sums the values of each.
      boolean Touple.equals​(Touple t)
      Checks equality of values between two touples.
      Constructors in movement with parameters of type Touple 
      Constructor Description
      MoveHistory​(Touple oldPosition, Touple newPosition)
      Records a move from one place to another.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Touple> Piece.possibleMoves()
      Gives all reachable spaces this piece can end up at in one move.
      Methods in piece with parameters of type Touple 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Piece.isValidMove​(Touple T)
      Checks if a given Touple is a valid move for this piece.
      boolean Piece.move​(Touple T)
      Sets a new position for the piece, as long as it's a legal move.
      boolean Piece.setPosition​(Touple T)
      Sets both the X and Y coordinates of the chess piece.
